page.title: 14Inverarity Primary School
page.content: Inverarity school was built in 1874 on the site of an old boys' school.It was made up of three classrooms and had more than one hundred pupils and three teachers.Today the old school is used as the new school's dining hall and sports hall.It is also used by clubs and community groups for large events. The new school was built in the 1950's and has four classrooms.It has three teachers and a pupil roll of fiftytwo.The school also has three visiting specialist teachers of Art,Music and Physical Education.
